column4: hey if I upgrade 6.06 to 7.04 I have to upgrade to 6.10 then to 7.04.... do I have to reboot twice after I upgrade to 6.10 can I continue to upgrade to 7.04 without rebooting ?
it is recommended to reboot after you install a newer kernel
and if it isn't necessary, it won't hurt either
but do I have to? I would rather not I am doing this on a server
